channel.title: Suzaku Village - Recruitment
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Suzaku Village - Recruitment" - - The Village Hidden in the Skies -

item.title: Re: Suzaku Village - Recruitment
item.content:encoded: Join us! Its awesome!! Over 100 upgrades,but you must be very loyal. If you join and become a Chunin,you will get epic armor,like me. ;)

item.title: Re: Suzaku Village - Recruitment
item.content:encoded:
We are currently sitting at 35 members. With a solid push of new members we hope to reach 40 shortly unlocking a host of new upgrades. Feel free to PM me if you have questions.

Join us in our success!

item.title: Re: Suzaku Village - Recruitment
item.content:encoded:
Our growth is only hampered by a lack of players.

Feel free to submit applications, we could use any and all active players!

item.title: Suzaku Village - Recruitment
item.content:encoded:
As a village we are looking to expand, and are in need of active Ninja to further facilitate future upgrades.

We have several Monster upgrades and are heavily involved in the NWW.

Members don't have access to upgrades by default, however once you're in the village your permissions will be changed shortly.

Science was recently activated, so come in and collect!
